summary:
With relevant experience of working as a university teacher, a research assistant and a helpline counselor, I aspire to seek opportunities in research and clinical settings. In the future, I strive to do therapy work, with special interest for personality and resilience.

Graduate of a Dutch research-oriented MSc of Clinical Psychology, holding a Croatian MSc degree in Psychology.

awards:
[{'title': 'Case Study Competition 2017 - 1st place', 'description': "My colleague Lucija Drača and I teamed up to present a case study for Reebok Croatia. The task was to create a campaign which would help establish Reebok on the market as a running brand, specialized for runners in the 'tough fitness' category. We have been given first place.

Case Study Competition is the leading regional competition in solving actual business cases intended for students of all interests. The CSC provides the opportunity for students to present their knowledge, skills and abilities before one of the best Croatian enterprises and future employers.", 'issuer': 'eStudent and Reebok', 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Case Study Competition 2016 - 2nd place', 'description': 'Case Study Competition is the leading regional competition in solving actual business intended for students of all interests. The CSC provides the opportunity for students to present their knowledge, skills and abilities before one of the best Croatian enterprises and future employers.

Along with my team members Lucija Drača, Borjan Pavlek and Sebastian Šušnjar, we have presented our case solution for Pliva & Teva group, creating an e-campaign for an upcoming type of birth control.
We have been elected as the first runner-up team.', 'issuer': 'eStudent and Pliva & Teva group', 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}]

Executing two types of tasks - administrative and practical.
Administrative tasks included contacting the participants, booking the lab sessions, preparing an analysis instruction document, and overall organization assistance. Practical tasks imply data collection in an the EEG lab. Research is done using the BioSemi ActiveTwo system (with 32+4 channels + 2 GSR electrodes).

My MA thesis at the EUR was part of this project (since September 2020). Through few weeks, I have been introduced to the work of a recruitment agency. I have enjoyed the dynamic setting and got a glimpse of the various tasks such as writing job adverts, recruitment selection, psychological assessment (diverse personality and ability tests) and writing a psychological report, conducting a group testing and headhunting.

Some of the tests I have worked with: 16PF, EPQ, NEO-PI-R, PIE, D-48 (Domino test), D2 (for attention and concentration abilities), GAT (Cro. "TOS"), A-RPM and DAT.', 'title': 'HR Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2029781, 'name': 'Au Pair International NL', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEofH0w3wsf1g/company-logo_400_400/0/1654152002953?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=dDXMXKpQuLqlqxJClfbMYRS818hlyL0WI29N40wwOr8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/au-pair-international-nl/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Au Pair International NL', 'description': 'Spent my graduation year abroad, living in Utrecht as an au pair.

Performance of the given tasks requires some features like time-management and overall organizational skills, beside the features and skills needed for childcare.', 'title': 'Au pair', 'employment_type': None}]}]
volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'role': 'Helpline counselor', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Hrabri telefon (Brave phone)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF4LTXaTFMyDg/company-logo_400_400/0/1607086553099?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=edCFWn0w_Vg6ll7v6wIl2Agt_cCPPZi2sCI7wueYirM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrabri-telefon/'}, 'cause': 'CHILDREN', 'description': '- counseling and support - helpline (for children and parents), chat and e-mail
- communication skills
- further education in the field through numerous trainings and education
- interdisciplinary work
- mentoring new volunteers (February-March 2017)

Extensive basic training in  working with abused and neglected children and the basic techniques of counselling work through topics: Emotionally disturbing calls, Electronic counselling, Communication skills, Multidisciplinary approach in children protection, Divorce, Abuse and neglect.

Additional training on the topics: Adolescence, Adoption, Attachment – supporting parents in encouraging child’s emotional development, Behavioral disorders, Chat counselling, Child anxiety, Children in court, Counselling skills – confrontation, Counselling skills in terms of “content” and “process”, Counsellor’s identity on helplines, Electronic abuse and violence, Forensic interview, Group processes, Manipulation of children during divorce, Multidisciplinary approach and cooperation in child protection, Parenting styles, Self-harm, Sexual abuse of children, Suicide, Support for grieving children
and The role of the Centre for Social Welfare in Child Protection.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'role': 'workshop co-leader', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Hrabri telefon (Brave phone)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF4LTXaTFMyDg/company-logo_400_400/0/1607086553099?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=edCFWn0w_Vg6ll7v6wIl2Agt_cCPPZi2sCI7wueYirM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrabri-telefon/'}, 'cause': 'CHILDREN', 'description': '"Zagrlimo s(v)e" (Let's (All) Hug) is a program coordinated by Brave Phone. The main purpose of the program is developing children's psycho-social strength and skills by creating a positive self-image, learning about emotions and coping, assertive communication skills and non-violent methods as well as children's rights.
Along with 2 great co-leaders, the program was realized through two workshop cycles throughout a school year, once every week.
The participants of the group were 6 wonderful children (11-14 y.o. in the first cycle; 8-12 y.o. in the second ) in Laduč group home.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'role': "Psychological First Aid at the ''Baby&Mother's corner''", 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'UNICEF', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQE5WFsvU5iicw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856174357?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wv1Nid09MpsBciWzz6p9fKkTtwXG7NiyQ_Wegdl7y1M', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unicef/'}, 'cause': 'HUMANITARIAN_RELIEF', 'description': "UNICEF and Društvo Naša Djeca Vinkovci
Ultimately, providing psycho-social care to the refugees at the Opatovac camp in eastern Croatia.
Positioned at the Baby&Mother's corner, the job included psychological first-aid, changing babies, preparing the milk formula and feeding the babies, changing the children clothes with the clean donated ones, creating a safe place for children to play and playing with them.
One of the biggest challenges was communicating with the refugees in a completely different way - the majority of them did not speak English or any other language besides Arabic. But we managed to solve every barrier in the way."}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'role': 'Exhibition Assistant', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Organ Vida - International Photography Festival', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQHfslrLB-JkvQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519866509055?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=s6u45KiEda1d8rWVY5rWddTsvkwC1VCdRmNOwTAveaE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/organ-vida---international-photography-festival/'}, 'cause': 'ARTS_AND_CULTURE', 'description': 'Diverse activities including setting up photo exhibitions and working in hospitality, along with guarding the exhibitions and preparing materials.
